I'm hungry!\""},{"lineNumber":149543,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はいっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes!\""},{"lineNumber":149544,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そして、その後はセックス！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"And after that, sex!\""},{"lineNumber":149545,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、う……うう……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, uh... always...)"},{"lineNumber":149556,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あいたっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ouch!\""},{"lineNumber":149557,"originalJapaneseLine":"「奴隷が調子に乗るな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Slave, don’t get cocky."},{"lineNumber":149558,"originalJapaneseLine":"　一歩後ろだ、一歩後ろ」","translatedEnglishLine":"One step back, one step too,"},{"lineNumber":149561,"originalJapaneseLine":"　後顧の憂いは消えた！」","translatedEnglishLine":"so no more worries behind joy."},{"lineNumber":149565,"originalJapaneseLine":"「皆さん、心配をかけて本当にすみません」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Everyone, I’m truly sorry for making you really...\""},{"lineNumber":149568,"originalJapaneseLine":"「シーラ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Sheera.\""},{"lineNumber":149569,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ヒューバートさん――","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hubert-san—"},{"lineNumber":149570,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ひゃっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Eep!\""},{"lineNumber":149571,"originalJapaneseLine":"ヒューバートの巨躯が","translatedEnglishLine":"Hubert's huge frame"},{"lineNumber":149572,"originalJapaneseLine":"シーラの小さな体を抱きしめた。","translatedEnglishLine":"embraced Sheera’s small body."},{"lineNumber":149573,"originalJapaneseLine":"「すまない、お前を護ることが出来なかった。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I’m sorry, I wasn’t able to protect you."},{"lineNumber":149574,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺はお前の兄貴みたいなもんだって吹いても……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Even though I boasted I was like an older brother to you...\""},{"lineNumber":149575,"originalJapaneseLine":"「この様だった……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Things turned out like this...\""},{"lineNumber":149576,"originalJapaneseLine":"　すまない……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm sorry...\""},{"lineNumber":149577,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ヒューバートさん……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hubert-san...\""},{"lineNumber":149578,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だが……ああ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But... ah..."},{"lineNumber":149579,"originalJapaneseLine":"　本当に良かった……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I’m truly glad...!\""},{"lineNumber":149580,"originalJapaneseLine":"兄のような人物の心からの言葉に、","translatedEnglishLine":"At the heartfelt words from the man like a brother,"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「せ、洗脳なんかじゃありません」
そう思わされているのね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They're being made to think that way..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうして二人はそんなに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: why do those two want so badly

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスって奴の所に戻りたいの？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: to go back to that guy named Rance?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シーラはぼうっとランスの顔を眺めた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sheera absentmindedly stared at Rance's face.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （わたし、この方の笑顔が好きなんだ……）
「まずは飯でも作れ！　腹が減ったぞ！」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Alright, you guys, let's return to the castle!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二人は異口同音で元気に返事をした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The two answered energetically in unison.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そっと、シィルがランスの隣に移動する。
その瞳がランスの横顔をじっと捉える。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Her eyes fixed intently on Rance’s profile.
One step back, one step back."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははは、奴隷共も戻って来たし

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so no more worries behind us!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そろそろあのキザ野郎に反撃だ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It’s about time to strike back at that smug bastard!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大統領であるシーラが戻り
ヘルマン軍司令部は喜びに沸いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the Helman Army Headquarters erupted in joy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「皆さん、心配をかけて本当にすみません」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Everyone, I’m truly sorry for making you worry."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いえ、よくぞ戻ってきて下さった……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, we're just glad you returned safely..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヒューバートの巨躯が
シーラの小さな体を抱きしめた。
「すまない、お前を護ることが出来なかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I’m sorry, I wasn’t able to protect you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺はお前の兄貴みたいなもんだって吹いても……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even though I boasted I was like an older brother to you..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 兄のような人物の心からの言葉に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the heartfelt words from the man like a brother,

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
